description: Five friends on a camping trip must survive the night while confronting each others' sinister pasts after one of them is found stabbed to death.

title: Varg Veum - Kalde hjerter
description: While investigating a case of sisters who have vanished, Varg Veum is about to become a father. He realizes that the case has connections to a police-investigated murder. Varg is obviously risking his pregnant wife's life if he wants to follow the case.

title: L'ultimo amante
description: An old Italian gentleman struggles with the idea of perfect love.

title: Tigisti
description: A malicious business partner, Mr. Fissehaye plots to remove his partner Amanual. Fissehaye sees an opportunity through his new employee Tigisti, an orphans and desperately in need of a job. The plot takes an unexpected twist when Zablon, the son of Mr Fissehaye complicates the plan. "Those that set in motion the forces of evil cannot always control them afterwards."

title: Vares: Gambling Chip
description: Vares falls in love with a beautiful brunette - only to lose her in a horrible way. After dating Sole a few weeks, her body is found in a bird-watching tower.

title: Three Days Happiness
description: In Athens, a city that decays, three young women are struggling to find their way out. As their paths cross in an unexpected way, they are driven to a violent adulthood.

title: The Second Woman
description: Hui Bao is an actress rehearsing for a performance in a theater play alongside her boyfriend Nan. Falling sick and being unable to perform in the play, her twin sister Hui Xiang replace her as an act of kindness. However, Hui Xiang performs outstandingly eventhough having no drama training. Hui Bao starts to suspect that her twin sister has a romantic interest in her boyfriend, and it drives a wedge between the them.

title: Deadtime
description: A Birmingham-based band are ordered by their unhappy record company to an old warehouse; the goal being to re-start their ailing careers with a kick-ass new promo video. Unfortunately the band and their entourage find themselves targets of a mysterious knife-wielding maniac, haunted by the voice of Satan, and out for revenge.

title: Suspicion
description: Darrell Jacobs, a retired member of the mafia, who is dying of lung cancer, unknowingly puts a college student, Alicia Foret's life in jeopardy when they begin meeting in public.

title: A Dark Place
description: This suspense-thriller combines groundbreaking cinematography and thought-provoking music, to tell the story of two men whose lives are turned upside down by the mysterious contents of a safe.

title: Francophrenia (or Don't Kill Me, I Know Where the Baby Is)
description: A mini-thriller comprised of TV footage of actor James Franco's guest-starring appearances on the American daytime drama, General Hospital (1963).
originalTitle: Francophrenia (Or Don't Kill Me, I Know Where the Baby Is)

title: Paranormal Adoption
description: A couple loses their only child in an accident and subsequently unknowingly adopts an innocent looking little girl with paranormal powers that she uses to fulfill her twisted desires.

title: Manslaughter
description: A lonesome ambulance driver turns both his life and society upside down after one night he violently loses his temper with the hoodlum youths who hinder him in performing his duties.

title: Brujas: The Witches of Sacramento River
description: Brujas: The Witches of Sacramento River is the story of two twin witches. One was meant to be good, and the other was meant to be... evil!

title: Purgatory
description: After being locked up in an institution for several years for a personality disorder and murder, Kristen Birger is released on parole. By means of therapy the medical staff of St. Carrol's Psychiatric Institution instructs her to return to her former apartment where she committed the crime seven years earlier. The moment she arrives at her flat, past and present seem to take her on a rollercoaster ride of fear. On top of that, a mysterious man and religious fanatic, living in the room next to hers, has a hidden agenda.

title: Sanctuary: Quite a Conundrum
description: Sex, drums, tequila, social networking, a pirate, morning after pills, Jesus and a gun. It's one hot mess!

title: Purification
description: Bret Fitzpatrick, a wealthy real estate investor in New York, faces a challenging journey between reality and the supernatural, confronting those in a stationary place and facing a 24-hour redemption deadline.

title: Tales from Mutantville
description: "Muticia the Movie Goddess" welcomes viewers to her Movie Morgue for a special screening of the horror anthology "Tales From Mutantville" comprised of Indigo Child, Family Fiend and Scarecrow At Midnight.

title: La peur de l'eau
description: Sergeant André Surprenant leads an ordinary life in the Îles-de-la-Madeleine with her teenage daughter. His world changes when Rosalie Richard, a young woman of 18 years and mayor's daughter is found murdered and raped on a cliff by the sea. Inspector Gingras arrives from Montreal to try to solve the murder. Seeing that the police of the metropolis focuses on ambiguous facts and seems to seek a suspect predetermined Surprising decides to conduct his own investigation with his partner, Genevieve Savoie, who is secretly in love with him. All the villagers are potential suspects.

title: Paura 3D
description: Three young musicians think they have luck on their side when they score the keys to a beautiful villa outside of Rome for the weekend. Unfortunately, they soon discover that they are not alone.

title: Cell Count
description: Russell Carpenter reluctantly admits his wife Sadie into an experimental treatment facility for her life threatening disease. While locked in this prison like surrounding they, along with 6 others, are unknowingly subjected to a cure that might just be worse than the disease itself.

title: Little District
description: The RH11 estate wait in anticipation on the sentencing of the two men who kidnapped and murdered Tommy King.

title: Zverinjak
description: "Menagerie" is a drama which takes place in the early 1990s, in one Serbian village near the coast of river Drina. It is a story about moral and historical breakdown of one country, located at a milieu separated from urban life, in an area that lives on specific rules and relationships between people. Srna, daughter of Strain, the most powerful man in the village, is promised for a wife to Jovan. Jovan is the son of a local forester Tadija, who, in return, allows Strain poaching and illegal cutting of village wood. Although there is attraction between Srna and Jovan, they still don't want to be married by the wish of their fathers. Suddenly Petar, the ex-forester who was seven years in jail for killing Strain's older son, returns to the village. His return changes lives of all characters in this story indicating the uncertain end of it.

title: I Think I Just Saw the Devil
description: A remorseful enforcer in hiding is forced back into the life he left behind in order to keep his new family safe. An abused young mother plods through her dysfunctional life, dwelling on a decision made years ago. Now after witnessing the murder of her best friend, she must navigate through the dangerous obstacles brought on by what she's seen. And finally a women hating, alcoholic who inadvertently sends a young girl to her death. Suddenly, he becomes the target of a vengeful mob boss who may have more than just revenge as motive The film features an immensely talented cast including Andre Davis, Susan Wynn Lunning, Rebekah DeWild, and Bill Blank. It also contains a beautiful soundtrack produced and preformed by cinematic composer Rich Cantrell. The film was produced by Aleksey Solodov. Thor Moreno writes and directs this thought provoking and violent thriller, woven through a series of vignettes. This film has adult themes, strong language, and strong images of violence. It is intended for mature audiences over 18.

title: Armynel
description: When suppressed memories of an abusive childhood begin to surface, a door is opened that was better left closed.

title: Schilf
description: Sebastian is a physics professor at the University of Jena and dealing for years with parallel universes. Meticulously, he tries to prove its existence scientifically. His college friend Oskar, professor of theoretical physics at CERN in Geneva, smiles at Sebastian's firm belief in parallel universes and the many-worlds theory. In order to devote himself to the evidence in peace, Sebastian brings his son Nick to a summer camp, while his wife Maike is on vacation in the mountains. At a rest stop Nick disappears out of the car and so for Sebastian a nightmare begins.

title: Immigrants
description: This sweaty bubbly TV action Drama series unfolds the thrillingly intense and sometime harsh lives of a few dispersed Israelis, trying to make it in the exuberant exhilarating, merciless city of Miami. We'll accompany our diverse characters on their wild ride: struggles, ordeals, and fun times, witness them trying to make ends meet, barely holding family together, rolling with the punches (and dishing out a few), crossing risky lines and chasing bigger-than-life ambitious dreams as they strive to shape a grander, more opulent future for themselves and the people around them.

title: Hey Arnold! The Movie
description: Trailer for "Hey Arnold! The Movie (2002)" released on Paramount Movies' YouTube channel, retroactively promoting the film in which Arnold, his best buddy Gerald and the rest of the gang face an industrialist with plans to wreck Arnold's neighborhood.

title: Psychotic
description: A psychologist is trapped inside a mental institution where all the patients have escaped and are on the rampage.

title: Theatre of the Deranged
description: Andy the Arsonist welcomes everyone to his theater of derange for a wild night of thrills, chills and spills. Andy kick's off the night by hosting five short horror films from some of the best Horror Writer/Directors in the indie scene.

title: Indemnity
description: A man on the run from his ex-lover, who has sworn to kill him, takes refuge in a rural bar, where he finds an unlikely ally in the local bartender. As the man opens up to the bartender over many rounds, the bartender - who is battling demons of his own - begins to wonder if the man is merely a victim of circumstance... or if he's hiding a much darker secret.

title: Dust
description: An Alien virus is unleashed on Earth, mutating millions into carnivorous beasts. Scientist Nick Richards, and a hard nosed team of survivors wage a losing battle against the alien force, desperately trying to restore Human life.

title: Children of the Grave 2
description: The true hauntings of ghost children and their emotional stories of the supernatural.

title: Las voces
description: Lying on her deathbed, Ema talks to her granddaughter about her grandfather. This re-awakes the interest of Clara, to know something about her father she never knew. Forty years ago Juan was a ventriloquist, but he committed a crime. Trying to survive, he finds a job performing a 'live show' in a movie theater. There he meets Ema, who is in charge of the wardrobe of the theater. Ema is young, beautiful and is deaf. Juan's world is becoming more and more confusing. The police are getting closer. Reality and hallucination get mixed up and Ema falls in love with Juan but soon realizes the crazy world in which he is immersed.

title: Sesuatu yang Tertinggal
description: The movie revolves around Arshad, Mona, Zakiah, Ashraf, Daud and Murni who are orphans in an orphanage undergoing an experience that has haunted them since they moved in to a new house. As the orphans were cleaning the house, they come across an antique cupboard and decide to move it to another room. Arshad found a mysterious mirror and gives it to Mona but doesn't know that there is something special the mirror. People in the school begin to suspect that Mona is possessed. The orphans must now plan something to capture the force that is dwelling in Mona - but they must first find out what is the significance of the mirror and the cupboard.

title: Fairy Tale Killer
description: A fearless cop is appointed to investigate a series of puzzling murders which resemble Fairy Tales.

title: WWW.
description: People say and do things in cyberspace that they wouldn't ordinarily say or do in the real world. It's a double-edged sword. Sometimes people share very personal things about themselves or they show unusual acts of sinfulness.

title: Supermarket
description: The head of a private security company seems to keep order in the supermarket. But weird things start happening when one of the customers disappears in the store on New Year's Eve.

title: Unnam
description: This movie is a remake of the Hindi film, Johnny Gaddar.

title: Frames
description: A young filmmaker uses his camera to transform the banality of his hometown into art. When a friend goes missing, however, his footage exposes a disturbing mystery . . . one he might be inventing.

title: Ayaz
description: Serial murders related to drugs are committed in Marmaris. A baron who wants to be alone in drugs and smuggling in the region establishes a strong network between France and Turkey. The drug lord is cornered by the commissioners.

title: Bad Guy
description: After dismantling the deadliest criminal organization in the city, the man known to his enemies only as "The Bad Guy" sets off a chain reaction of violence that not even the law can contain. With the police closing in, and corruption everywhere, one wrong move could be the difference between life and death. And as a new kind of threat emerges, The Bad Guy must protect the woman he loves from becoming the next target. Buckle up for this supercharged action thriller from Atomic Independent Pictures and S/G Productions.

title: El eco del miedo
description: A young woman in the middle of an economical crisis, a little girl who is facing a new environment and a loyal dog that will work as a link between both, will have to spend two nights in an old big house that is falling into pieces. Sounds at night and shadows accompanied with threatening echoes emerging from darkness are constant in the house. Will they be able to undergo the situation and solve the enigma that surrounds the presence that still rounds the house?

title: Crime Story
description: Hari and Meera are close friends who work in an IT company. Their life takes a turn when one of their close friends gets murdered.

title: Sasesham
description: Sri Ram (Vikram Sekhar) director of popular television soap 'Nelavanka' takes off to a guesthouse in the Nallamala forests to write new episodes for the show. Destiny shows him other plans when he meets Jeni (Supriya).

title: Labyrint
description: A horror story about four friends who find the entranceway to a network of medieval tunnels beneath Prague. After journalist Renata's (Lucie Vondrácková) colleague disappears in the cellar of her building one night and her Argintinian roommate starts having strange dreams, weird things start to happen in the building. When the two girls and their neighbor Honza (Martin Zbrozek) and friend David (Jan Zadrazil) find the entrance to an underground labyrinth in the cellar and decide to enter it in search of the missing girl, we soon realize that they will have to fight for their lives.

title: Dead Herring
description: Six friends are called together under the guise of an emergency, only to find themselves at the center of an elaborate scheme concocted by a mysterious mastermind who threatens to kill them if they do not obey his instructions.

title: Cold Blood
description: 'Revenge is a dish best served cold' Following Craig's release from prison, ex business partner Mike throws him a welcome home freedom party at his new farmhouse, where he is reunited with his old flame, Anna. As night falls, things dramatically take a turn for the worse as underlying resentment and tensions explode. Craig and Anna are suddenly faced with a nightmare situation whereby they must make a life-changing decision.

title: Prizrak iz Khovrino
description: Four friends went to the forest with a bad history where Russian ancient sorcerers used to sacrifice people. They were trying to make a film about a ghost who lives in this forest according to the legend but very soon a pleasant and funny adventure turns into a nightmare. Nobody can escape the Ghost from Hovrino and only their camera can tell what happened there.

title: Cop vs. Killer
description: Enigmatic Dutch crime lord Mirko is always a step ahead of the national police team. When Mirko's gang are forced to kill Russian mob baron Oleg's brother Boris, the cops hope their time has come. Both sides resort to dirty tricks, testing loyalties and using the antagonists' daughters and independent pimp Aziz for blackmail, which makes several bloody victims.

title: The Second Death
description: Clueless on a gruesome case, a skeptical and lonely policewoman in a small village, is guided by a newly arrived clairvoyance gifted boy, who claims that the murderer is the Virgin Mary.

title: Pseudo
description: A detective with questionable methods enlists his group of friends to take down the drug dealers who control his city.

title: Khon Lohk Jit
description: A psychological-thriller which explores the inner thoughts of four characters: a psychologist, a scientist, a businessman, and a student. The characters are coincidentally involved in a case of serial murders.

title: The Clairvoyant's Prayer
description: A strangled prostitute is found outside the city of Mar del Plata. A detective, a journalist and a clairvoyant collaborate in a complex investigation that trigger other crimes.

title: Sumpahan Kum Kum
description: Mila feeling stressful with her looks went to see a shaman to fix her face. Mila needs to follow the rules that have been set. But Mila broke the rules turning her face back to ugly. Mila went to see the shaman again and she needs to drink the blood of 9 virgin lady. Mila followed Mak Tom's rule and her first victim is Shima, Mak Tom's daughter. Mak Tom is enraged and planned to kill Mila. It all started when Mila swore to kill all the girls in Mak Tom's family. Since Mila's death, her spirit roaming around disturbing the villagers. When Mak Tom passed away, Adi has to come back to the village to arrange his mother's funeral even though he has been prohibited to do so. Their returned caused bad things to happen. Adi has been possessed but he finally managed to beat the evil power.

title: Extreme Counterstrike
description: Major cites are being blown apart. An evil terrorist cell will stop at nothing to destroy society. Kane is sent to seek out and destroy them all, no rules will apply! Can he battle the terrorists and his own personal problems?

title: Zero One
description: Zero One tells the story of Devon Owens, a man who has to make choices in order to protect a world he may not truly want to save.

title: Nomer 1000
description: A powerless man attempting suicide is being attacked by ruthless 1400 years old ancient warrior.

title: The Hit
description: When a mobster's wife drains his checking account, she becomes a target of her husband's hitmen. What these hardcases fail to understand is that she is as unpredictable as they come, and more than a match for any man.

title: This Weekend
description: Sanjay's family goes on a picnic into a forest. They lose their way in the jungle and encounter a gang involved in stealing organs. Sanjay fights against the gang to save his family.

title: SoulMate: True Evil Never Dies
description: History's most notorious Killer has come back from the dead and is killing again in a small sleepy town. Unable to get a lead, the police are forced to try an unconventional way to catch this serial killer before he strikes again. They bring a psychic named Katie onto the case to try and predict his next move and finally put an end to this towns nightmarish ordeal. As she is trying to help the police, Katie begins seeing a prominent psychiatrist to deal with some of her own dark issues that begin to surface during the investigation. As she gets closer to the killer people she cares about begin being murdered one by one, causing her to seek out this killer on her own ensuing into a battle for her very soul. SoulMate takes the audience on a path of no return with many twists and turns and an ending that will leave you terrified.

title: Stone
description: When a well-known businessman has his 7 year old son kidnapped, he has no idea of what is coming next. It turns out that the mysterious kidnapper needs no redemption, and his only demand is to the father. During the following days he has to decide between saving his son, or himself.

title: Living in Sin
description: A killer lurks in the darkness behind the shadows of a college campus. Can the lead detective catch them before they kill again or will this Jack the Ripper get away with murder?

title: King Toad
description: A mysterious stranger crashes into a rural town with Machiavellian designs. He infiltrates the town using its denizens' sins, ambitions and tragedies against them. Offering redemption, he may bring only brutality.

title: New Order
description: The year is 2033, three years prior an infection, a virus, or a bacteriological attack wiped out almost 90% of the global population

title: Achante Aanmakkal
description: Madhava Menon, a retired police officer, becomes a victim of political rivalry when he admits to have killed a boy and is imprisoned. His son-in-laws take it upon themselves to prove their father's innocence.

title: Project Breakwater
description: As summer begins to wane into autumn, Detective Benoit Michaud investigates what appears to be the suicide of prominent journalist Sandra Templeton. Michaud soon realizes that the suicide may have involved her stalker, a man with a mysterious past who underwent secret military training. The intricate web of deception expands as Michaud uncovers a report Templeton had been working on in which she describes the real reason for the G20 fences in downtown Toronto. As Michaud delves further, he realizes the murder is more than it seems, leading him to discover that the crime is part of a vast conspiracy by shadowy forces attempting to cover up the connection between the G20 fences, the earthquake, and power outage all occurring during the summer of 2010.

title: The Darkest Hour: Visualizing an Invasion
description: The Stars Have A Sit Down.

title: Stephen Kings, I Am the Doorway
description: A short movie inspired by Stephen King's science fiction short story "I Am the Doorway".

title: Inside the Stones
description: The web-series highlights the UNESCO sites in the Lazio region, since the episodes were filmed in historically and culturally famous locations, such as Villa Adriana, Villa d'Este and Tarquinia and Cerveteri necropolises.

title: Absolute Fear
description: Jessie Vallequette follows her scribe boyfriend of 3 years, Dale Morrow, on a search for his long-lost father, last heard from on a deserted island in the Philippines. Along with a group of unwitting friends, the young couple encounters more than they bargained for after discover not only was Dale's father part of a top-secret government project testing the depth of people's fears, but also that he had very good reason for not wanting to be found.

title: On the Edge
description: Everyone struggles with pain and hard decisions in their lives. But when someone gets pushed to the edge, how will they respond? Olivia (Ryleigh Sykes) is a seemingly normal teenage girl who deals with the pressures of school, love and family life by writing in her journal. But after a post graduation camping trip with her friends, Olivia's secrets finally come undone. The events that take place on that fateful weekend are retold through her best friend Charlie (Cindy Myskiw) who has written a memoir about her own life and the secrets that have been revealed after discovering Olivia's journal.

title: Where is Primer Green?
description: Primer Green searches for his missing sister and then he disappears.

title: Siinä näkijä missä tekijä
description: During the Continuation War Finland had allied with Hitler's Germany. The underground resistance group believed that the Soviet Union would win the war and that Finland would get rid of the bourgeoisie.

title: Autumn Rails
description: A lonely private investigator tries to find his way out of the depressing city he's spent his entire life in. When he finds a bag of stolen money and falls in love with a mysterious young women, he's forced into a three way conflict with the city's drug dealers and a group of amateur kidnappers.

title: Weekend Movie
description: After convincing himself that his videos have taken a turn for the worse, Cameron decides to bring the crew together for one last movie.

title: Kulu Manali
description: Three couples go honeymooning to a scenic place - away from city life. Nothing can go wrong, except may be a voyeur cab driver, a suspicious hotel manager, an inquisitive inspector, and everybody's dark pasts.

title: Villains
description: An aging villain double deals his associates but is outsmarted by his lying daughter.

title: Spare Time Killers
description: The saga of two longtime hit-men. One decides it's time to retire, the other goes on a deadly rampage.

title: Wolff - Kampf im Revier
description: A seemingly simple case about parental abuse of their daughter, investigated by a police veteran, turned out to be much more complicated.

title: Sex Love Revenge
description: A young woman's tragic experience with love and how it changes her for the better - or for the worst.

title: Private Life
description: It is about a man who claims to be religious but uses religion to do against morals and his martial life and his affair with another woman.

title: September Runs Red
description: Taylor Evans, a successful, pretty modern day woman is finding her world rapidly collapsing around her as a sudden and unexplained phobia to water grips her psyche, shattering her fragile world. In desperation to save herself, Taylor reaches out to Dr. John Cane, a cast out phobia specialist, and ally of the worst kind. Dr. Cane, a notorious psychiatrist whose recent prominence and rise in the medical community is linked to a successful but controversial behavior analysis treatment he's pioneered on a desolate island. Reluctantly, Dr. Cane agrees to treat Taylor's irrational fear of water but on the sole condition the treatment take place on the remote island for her safety and wellbeing. Once on the secluded island, Taylor begins to suspect that Dr. Cane might not be giving her the whole truth, and that a terrible fate will befall her if she doesn't find a way off the island. Complicating matters further, Taylor learns Dr. Cane has a collaborator and a secret he's been hiding for more than thirty years, a secret he desperately wants to keep concealed at all cost. Driven to escape the island and the eerie Doctor, Taylor must face the demons within and enter the dark creepy lake water to reclaim the strength she desperately needs to salvage her being and escape the island alive. On the island nothing is ever what it seems.

title: A Teia de Gelo
description: Jorge, an ambitious young computer worker, diverts a large amount of money from the company where he works for his personal account. When his boss discovers threatens to kill him, if he does not receive the money back.

title: A Dangerous Place
description: An innocent woman, Claire Scully is drawn into a terrorist plot to kill people through the mail using a deadly strain of TB.

title: Mama's Boy
description: At a very young age, Mobo Jeeba witnessed the rape and murder of his mother, Akushika. As he grew up, the traumatizing effect haunted Jeeba, molding him into a ruthless killer. Strange twists of events soon lead him on a journey that will unveil the mystery surrounding his mother's death. And on this journey--there will be BLOODSHED.

title: Traficantes de organos Humanos: los ayudantes de satanas
description: A married couple spends the night at the house of their dead mother-in-law in order to receive their heritage, once there, they discover a sinister secret.

title: Encounters
description: A caring brother, tortured by the unexplained murder of his younger sister, is driven to eccentric measures to resolve her past.

title: Dirty Bomb
description: Three military trained bio-chemical research scientists reunite after a deadly virus they helped contain in Afghanistan turns up in a research lab in the U.S. and is unknowingly being used and tested in major cities in the U.S. and blames terrorist groups of using Dirty Bombs to infect the population and cover up the truth of what the virus is really being used for.

title: The Punished
description: A notorious criminal King is being punished by having to face his deepest fears.

title: Das Geheimnis der Villa Sabrini
description: Susanne works for an auction company, and founds out that a painting that they have been charged to sell is a copy. So she goes to Florence, where the expert that made the valuation lives, and meets with the owner.

title: Reality XL
description: On 13 January 2011, highly intelligent but irritable Professor Konstantin Carus (Heiner Lauterbach) enters the control room of the particle accelerator together with 23 colleagues. Eight hours later, at 6 am on 14 January 2011, the 23 scientists of the night shift have disappeared without a trace! The only survivor of this tragedy is Konstantin Carus. In order to solve this mysterious case, he is being examined at a secret location by representatives of the Swiss Depart of Public Prosecution (Max Tidof, Annika Blendl). They expect answers from him to these burning questions: Did the incalculable experiment create a temporary Black Hole, absorbing the surrounding matter? Does the LHC endanger the whole world? An incredible story begins ...

title: The Missing Screenwriter
description: Robert Hurley, a Los Angeles-based screenwriter of Notes from the New World, based on Dostoevsky Notes from the Underground, has vanished shortly after reporting harassment from unidentified people.

title: Valentine's Night
description: 5 random people who has just had breakups decide to meet on a Valentines Night and have a joyride in a stretch BMW. Little do they know that they will get implicated with something they haven't even thought at all.

title: Pots and Pans
description: A government's decree to freeze all bank accounts leaves a retired man with no alternative but to devise a sly way to get his money to survive.

title: St. Patrick's Day
description: A man in a welding mask targets a group of party-going teenagers.

title: Bi xian jing hun
description: Arts and drama students, rented a house with a courtyard in the suburds. It's an old building with an ancient feel in it. It's an eerie place. The locals avoided this place. During a quiet night, the electricity stopped. The four young men and women decided to play a game of Bunshidaba or Bi Xian.

title: The Cuddly Toy
description: A haunting teddy bear destroys the life of Marek Feldmann.

title: All Dark Places
description: Jamie and Christian are giving their marriage one last shot for the sake of love and their young son, Dylan. But when Christian proves unable to hold up his end, forces both within and outside their relationship will decide their future.

title: #Touch
description: Two brothers, separated at birth, each with a unique ability. The younger brother, Sam, works as a hospital custodian and has the power to 'heal' and give life with the touch of his hand. The older brother, Cole, can 'take' life with his touch. This new, interactive on-line series shows what happens when these opposite forces collide for the first time.

title: Red Sheep
description: After taking his own life, Lyndon (Jonathan Regier), unknowingly wakes up in the middle of a circular afterlife with greetings from Death in human form (George Katt). Before understanding this painful inner circle, he must step back to the outer circle where his sins began: the death of his girlfriend, Sarah (Sarah Taurchini) and subsequently the death of himself. Death, in human form, or Johnny as he calls himself, steals Lyndon's prayers for a proper reunion between the two and instead forces him to face a new and much darker reality.

title: Starla
description: A taut thriller that chronicles a young woman's struggle with the loss of her daughter to a botched surgery and her attempt to get even with the surgeon who killed her.

title: Uncanny
description: There is a vortex, a cavity of dangerous ambiguity the size of our imagination right in Uncanny Pennsylvania.

title: Loitolla
description: When mother and her daughter go hiking into the forest far away from any settlement, things suddenly turn into worse when they get lost from each other by accident.

title: The Muse
description: A one-hit-wonder musician battles writers block and a strange inspirational force at a secluded lake house.

title: Inside
description: Mark and Sarah are a bourgeois couple in crisis. One night, two dangerous criminals break into their house.

title: Manigances
description: Michel Galand, famous novelist, invites five friends for dinner. He prepared everything: good wine, small presents for everyone, a good meal and... his suicide as dessert. But the events do not turn out as the writer had planned.

title: Lamh el-Basar
description: While trying to win the heart of an old love, the ambitious Fouad runs into Gaber, a mysterious older man. Gaber takes Fouad into a journey of the unexpected.

title: Avalon
description: Alex Calibourne a mysterious man on a highway at night, driving a muscle car to a seedy motel. He may not be all that appears on the surface.

title: Love You to Death
description: An outrageous comedy about love that doesn't exist, about therapy that doesn't work and murder that just might happen.

title: In nomine Satan
description: Inspired by a true story, the film begins with the arrest of a boy and a girl (Antonio and Elena) both in shock and stoned by a mix of drugs and alcohol. The two guys are admitted to hospital where they both confess the murder of their friend Angela. A brutal murder and devoid of logic that will lead investigators to suspect that the two killers were not alone. Investigators soon discover a reality completely unknown to them: that of Satanism.

title: Operation Terror
description: CIA agent Aaron Delgado works with a team of agents and engineers to implement a plan to attack the World Trade Center and the Pentagon, pinning the blame on Muslim Terrorists.

title: Monster Movie Night
description: "Monster Movie Night" film starring Bobby Gammonster and Boris T Buzzard with special guest host, Danvers of Demented Features together showing the feature film "Anatomy of a Pyscho".

title: Off Season
description: Sylvie Stone takes refuge in an isolated beach hideaway after her husband is convicted of a sweeping act of financial fraud. A series of frightening occurrences lead her to discover she's being stalked by a mysterious presence.

title: Woman Plus Tree
description: An unfulfilled artist, his schizophrenic wife and a teenage son suffering from prosopagnosia - in other words, a dysfunctional family of eccentrics in 1930s Europe comes together to overcome a common threat; a serial killer.

title: Radiacions
description: A lawyer with political concerns meets with a close friend, a specialist in new technologies and the Internet, to convince him to take part in the project of construction of a nuclear power plant at the entrance of a big city. Great interpretative duel between two veteran Catalan actors such as Ferran Rañé and Francesc Orella. A real delight.

title: Vetrelci a lovci: Uzij si se psem
Untold Secrets
description: A year after the lost battle against the experiment, Kate Jones is once again targeted by the organisation and a revengeful Jack Smith and Helen Day. After the apparent loss of Jack, her brother Charlie and dozens of others, it is now up to Kate to discover the truth and protect the world from the approaching threat. With a global telephone call aimed to have catastrophic effects on every single human being who answers, the race is on to prevent the organisation from releasing the '555 Drug' worldwide. Who will survive as the series reaches its heroic finale.

title: Dokurogeki: atoaji no warui sasupensu
description: An omnibus drama that delivers suspense with a bad aftertaste, a number of bad endings with a hopeless aftertaste, and indescribable "unbearable" emotions, this feeling will surely become a habit.

title: Coldwood
description: Single mother Ashley travels to Alaska to work with her Uncle Clive, a con man swindling money from people who believe their homes are haunted. As Ashley tackles her own demons the team must face real supernatural forces beyond anything they've ever experienced.

title: Demons and Doors
description: With her mind in jeopardy all Marion has left is her talent to escape.

title: N.F.A. (No Fixed Abode)
description: Adam has it all - a beautiful wife and daughter and home, but one day he wakes up in a hostel for the homeless - how did he there and how can he get his life back?

title: X Game 2
description: High school girl and four other people were forced to play a X-game to take responsibility for what they did in the past.

title: The Hidden Woman
description: Marc Delvaux, an ex-cop, lives alone in a large building on the banks of the Saône. When a lawyer friend asks him to house a young woman who has to testify, he accepts without suspecting that he has just signed his return to the field.

title: Un nuage dans un verre d'eau
description: An Egyptian living in Paris disappears mysteriously, and his grandson searches for him.

title: The Undertaker's Son
description: Extortion, Blackmail and Murder push a goodhearted young man over the edge.

title: Any Other Side
description: Five friends meet at a bar on the night of Halloween. They take turns to tell spooky stories to each other.

title: Broken
description: A troubled man responsible for a series of violent attacks on criminals calls a radio show to provoke the nation to stand up to crime and fight back.

title: The Burning Within
description: The continuing story of Detective Adam Sera, and his new nemesis - the Fireman.

title: B & W the Black and White Fact
Kishibe-chou Kidan: Tanbou-hen
description: A full-length sequel to the 'Kishibe-chou Kidan' short from Outsider: 052 (2010), and its prequel Chapter 2: Kaiki Tokubetsu Tantei (2010). An intern teacher named 'Tomoko Takayanagi' at Kishibe High School has an indescribable and mysterious aura. Two members of a special detective team realize this and start to investigate. As they search for the truth, the strange phenomena around Kishibe High School all seem to be connected to one another.

title: Your Girl Is Mine: The Beginning
description: An aspiring young singer with a promising future and a new love, risks losing everything when the brother he secretly had put away in an institution escapes. And wants him dead.

title: Art of Survival
description: James and Wild Bill, two self proclaimed survival experts and stars of their own reality TV show, explore and demonstrate survival techniques in the Black Fork Wilderness area in a remote corner of Oklahoma. Two young women from Tulsa, huge fans of the show, arrive and watch as the two survivalists shoot a segment. Later that day the camera crew leaves and a night of wild debauchery ensues. The next morning they find they are being hunted by the ultimate predator...a lunatic redneck from Arkansas. A real life survival scenario unfolds as they fight to stay alive.

title: Altered States of Plaine
description: A young man on the run from a mysterious government agency is desperate to find the cure for a condition that causes him to wake up at random places around the world when he falls asleep.

title: Thrllrrr
description: This video shows Stewart's youngest daughter, Sisi, wandering through a vacant warehouse in Nashville

title: Benjamin Wolf
description: Wolf, Carlos and Dum Dum join the same gang, but have no idea of each others existence, until they are classified together for an assassination. An unfortunate turn of luck ensures that the mission fails and their leader gives the men, out of frustration, an impossible last-change task to prove their loyalty to him. In the meantime, a rival gang has hired a professional hitman to kill the men before completing the task, and also has a personal feud with one of them.

title: To Fetch a Predator
description: With a spoof on the famous Dateline NBC show playing in the background, this crime thriller - a la Hitchcock interlaced with wry humor - is a fun "Darkotica" that will make you sit on the edge of your seat and thrill you with a smile. Fritz Handsome has been given the opportunity of a life time and all the breaks that one can dream of. He is married to a beautiful heiress and is the host of the most controversial TV series in the land. But trouble in paradise emerges as soon as the show hits the air. Mysterious phone calls, murder, extortion, desperation and kidnapping are just a few of the scenarios you will experience in this roller coaster ride. Full frontal nudity and some violent sex adds to this mix to make it a unique viewing experience. With Brent Collins from Payton Collins: Serial Rapist and a new cast, this film from cult writer/director Toby Ross is blast.

title: Embrace
description: After a chaotic event leaves the world in darkness, two teenagers, along with their neighbor, travel to a remote location where they discover a hidden secret, that may cost them, their lives.

title: Remake
description: After Pastor Carl Slayton's daughter is kidnapped by the Snuff filmmaker 'Twitch,' Carl learns that his wife Rita has a secret past and that the kidnapping was not random. Twitch wants something from Rita, and the clock is ticking. Will Carl and Rita be able to resolve their differences and work together to defeat Twitch?

title: Meaningless
description: Koji and Shizuko have soon been married for 5 years. To pay for the land and construction of their house, Koji spends more and more time at work. Shizuko on the other hands commutes to a mental health clinic where she's enjoying an illicit relationship with the clinic's attending physician, Toshiro Fujimura. One day, Shizuko and Toshiro become involved in a traffic accident. Toshiro dies, while Shizuko becomes is in a serious condition, unconscious. Through the accident, Koji finds out about Shizuko's infidelity, and is emotionally ripped apart by anger and sadness. In this grievous state, Fujimura's wife, Miwa, appears. Koji and Miwa become attracted to each other and begin a relationship, as they are both are grieving the loss of their partners.

title: Murder Dance
description: Artistic community struggles to relate to each other as murders are committed around their Brooklyn neighborhood.

title: The Shapeshifter
description: Where to draw the line between imagination and insanity?

title: A Jasmine for a Gardener
description: A young woman from a wealthy family decides to return to her home country of Guyana after deciding to quit medical school. Her father arranges her marriage to a local wealthy boy with dark secrets-meanwhile, she falls in love with the local village gardener who has secrets of his own.

title: Victims of Circumstance
description: A professional assassin working for a shadow division of the government is faced with a crisis of conscience and must choose between the man he is and the hero he longs to be. Good and Evil become blurred lines on his moral compass as the clock ticks down to his final, life-changing decision.

title: Bekhabar
description: To boost his struggling career in modeling world a handsome boy moves in relationship with an established star female model. In the meantime he falls in love with a school teacher.This hurts star model .Now she acts to destroy everything.

title: Hand of Glory
description: Lonely delivery man Joseph falls in love with an alcoholic prostitute named Karen, who frequents one of the stops along his route. Though they soon become friends, Joseph is unable to figure out what makes the very-guarded Karen tick. While Karen drowns the sorrows of her mysterious past, keeping him at bay, Joseph remains committed to winning her affection, resorting to extreme measures in his search for the key to her heart. Embarking on a dark journey with a mystical relic -a 'hand of glory,' whose legend purports the ability to unlock any door- Joseph soon discovers that such feats come at a dire price.

title: Beyond Control
description: A decade of conspiracies, frauds, and murders unfolds after Victoria Crown reveals that her husband, Jose Farias, is involved in drug trafficking. As an immigrant from Brazil, Jose is a chef at a five star restaurant and very connected to his family. Detective John Gore investigates the case to put an end to the alleged illegal business. Beyond Control takes us on a journey that warns us how trust can affect us forever.

title: Abeo Pharisee
description: Good and Evil clash in this dark suspense thriller when a maniacal serial killer leaves a string of victims who've been marked for death by their perceived bad behavior.

title: Houston & 6th
description: Two women plan to murder their mutual lover. For one woman, he is the love of her life. For the other woman, he is her husband.

title: Enemy of the Mind
description: How do you catch a killer who knows your every move?

title: In diesem Moment
description: When Clive and Melanie cross paths with a psychopath, fresh from a kill, it sets the killers eyes on a new prize and trophy - Clive's wife Melanie.

title: The Suicide's of Mike
description: Mike is a lonely teen who is bullied and has decided to end his life. However, this won't be the first time Mike has tried to kill himself - he's had many failed attempts. This time around, Mike plans to film his last 24-hours.

title: Brooklyn Breach
description: Brooklyn Breach follows the arc of three Brooklyn families whose lives are under constant hidden surveillance. As we voyeuristically examine their secret lives, we follow each family's descent toward its own life-changing event.

title: Dire Digest
description: Dire Digest is the newest feature film from PMP Productions. It's a horror anthology with six interlocking stories from six different writers. Stories include: Just a Dream (written by Michael Karlin and directed by Aubry Peters) An Occurrence (written and directed by J. Scott Winegarner) It's Nothing (written and directed by William L. Harper) Necessary (written and directed by Aubry Peters) Engraved Danger (written and directed by Davis Lee DeRock Jr.) The Ark (written and directed by Dustin Hall)

title: Once Bitten
description: Jess learns that there is no escape from her past as her family secret begins to uncover.

title: We Bought a Ghost
description: John and Kathy buy the house of their dreams, only to discover that they are not alone.

title: Síndroma de Estocolmo
description: A actress, participates in her first film about a couple of bank robbers, hoping to gain more fame and credibility with it. But when fiction mixes with reality, she will realize that she can get much more than she asked for.

title: Shift
description: During a routine business trip, Scott encounters a hitchhiker on a lonely back Iowa highway and offers him a ride. Along the way, both men discover that their views on life are quite different and their journey together escalates from casual to chaos.

title: Where's the Bloody Money?
description: A bank heist succeeds brilliantly, until the robbers start counting the money.

title: Winters
description: For the last four years, Amanda Winters has been working as a highly trained assassin for a sector of the Australian Government known as "The FACTION". She is the best the organisation has against counter terrorism. After stumbling on secrets about the agency and their involvement with overseas terrorists , she is branded a conspirator and terrorist. She is now the most wanted person by the Government. With no one to trust, Winters plans to get the answers she needs to clear her name from the agency that created her. The Faction are in for one hell of a fight.

title: Skyfall Videoblog: Production Update from Shanghai
Banana Man
description: A runner goes for his morning jog unaware that he is on a collision course with a banana peel.

title: The Mystic Tales of Nikolas Winter
description: A great magician must do battle with an immortal alchemist.

title: A Mysterious Robber
description: A geologist and his daughter went to find a gold mine. They were chased by a a group of robbers to find out the location of the gold mine. During the chase,the geologist fell off the cliff and the daughter lived. A mysterious revenge story began to unfold.

title: Tish Ho
description: Guy is out of touch with emotions, Julie is desperate to conceive a child and the planet is being dumped with the waste of 7 billion people. All seem quite normal problems until the suspicions of a strange new disease start to filter into the everyday discomforts of Guy and Julie's life. With dark-edged humour this wonderfully absurd thriller offers a quirky solution for the state of the planet.

title: Trapped
description: Sam, a professional scriptwriter gets trapped by his own mind while he was dreaming about the perfect story to write as usual. This last time he wakes up from his dream with his wife bleeding close to him.

title: Week-End
description: Ten years after not seeing each other Gabriel, Raphael, Mickael and Marie plan to go on a weekend to catch up with the good old times in a small house far away from any kind of civilization. Mickael starts to film the weekend as a souvenir, but soon the amusement of the trip will give way to the unexpected.

title: Through the Same Lens
description: A couple trying to have a kid that leads to tensions and finding out what people are capable of doing to please or get what they want.

title: The Angel of My Life
description: In 1986, China is collapsed after Maos regime is losing control over China the country that splits a father from his daughter, who must survive on her own.

title: Phase Three
description: A young, petty thief attempts to steal from noxious businessman Lucius Foy and inadvertently becomes the subject of a dangerous corporate training regime.

title: Engagement
description: Henry has just learned that his fiancée has a twin sister. Unsure if she is who she claims, Henry is seduced all over again.

title: Afrique Noire Marbre Blanc
description: 'Black Africa White Marble' is a gripping, real-life David-and-Goliath thriller told with an innovative blend of animation, puppetry, archive materials, and original footage (shot in Congo, Gabon and Italy). When the president of the Republic of Congo decides to transfer the remains of the pacifist explorer Pietro Brazza to a multi-million dollar mausoleum in the impoverished capital of Brazzaville, one woman stands in his way. Writer Idanna Pucci discovers an insidious hidden agenda behind the plan. Violence, corruption and skulduggery lie at the heart of the matter as she battles to save Congo's great spiritual leader King Makoko and defend the ideals of her ancestor. The film sheds harsh light on Central Africa's colonial past and its corrupt present.

title: Kidnapped
description: Over the past five years Europe has imported, from countries like Venezuela, Colombia and Mexico, a style of abduction known as an express kidnap. These abductions don‰ЫЄt usually last more than one day and are characterised by violence. Each year in Europe there are 3,000,000 home raids, one every 10 seconds. In over thirty percent of cases, the family is at home when the raid occurs. The fusion of these two crimes has resulted in a new form of criminal assault in which the robbers not only ransack the houses they break into but also kidnap the family for short periods of time. Family members are then forced to hand over as much money as possible to the assailants. On very few occasions do such attacks end without serious injury. Kidnapped is the story of one of these attacks.

title: Fun Arrived
description: A famous Bollywood film star turns into a vampire during Christmas holidays in Goa, India and she sucks blood of young virgin men.

title: The Casebook of Eddie Brewer
description: Eddie Brewer is an old-school paranormal investigator, being followed as part of a documentary .

title: The Table
description: Two friends buy, what looks to be, an antique table before discovering it has a far more sinister purpose.

title: Rakhtbeej
description: Rakhtbeej is the story of two men, from two different generations. Even though their worlds are different their lives keep intersecting. Abhay Jatav from humble beginnings, ends up becoming the most dreaded dacoit in UP. Ajay also from humble beginings, becomes the CEO of Dabral Group of Industries, at a very young age. Abhay knows Sarita from a long time, and Sarita is in love with Abhay. But when a simple village girl Poonam enters Ahbay's life he totally forgets about Sarita. Sanjana, Dabral's daughter is in love with Ajay from a long time. But when supermodel Priya enters his life, he is blinded by her love. Abhay goes out of his way to help Maya Singh win the village elections. But Maya Singh later backstabs Abhay. Abhay loose his friends and those dear to him and this changes his fate forever. Ajay trusts Dharam, his competitor in business and love, but Dharam backstabs him. Abhay becomes a victim of Politics, Police and Dacoits, while Ajay is the victim of business rivalry. Even though these men are from different generations, their lives resemble each others. Just like Abhay, Ajay too has to choose between his friends, love, relationships and ambition. Is Ajay related to Abhay? Will he ever know? Just because their lives are similar, will they meet with a similar fate?

title: L'affaire Chebeya, un crime d'Etat?
description: On 2 June 2010, a Congolese human rights activist was found murdered in his car. Several police officials are arrested. Is the judicial authority capable of exercising an impartial justice?

title: That's Beautiful Frank
description: A New York French Futurist performance artist faces pressure from his East-Village theater manager to increase ticket sales. Inspired, he purchases a black market handgun and begins looking for his audience; committing a series of armed robberies to steal empty boxes from eccentrics living in the Village. The NYPD investigating detective struggles to find reason or motive, deducing this ritualistic purification of the odd must be work of jihadists. When the detective yaws to yearnings for an agoraphobic shut-in robbery victim beauty, he unknowingly sets the stage for a Futurist swansong performance. This picture transposes Italian Futurism into the downtown New York performance scene today, making it both a Futurist comedy and an unvarnished document from the Lower East Side.

title: Ultrasonic
description: A musician with hyper-sensitive hearing goes in search of an ominous sound that plagues him, but is inaudible to everyone else.

title: Retaliate
description: After being double-crossed and left for dead, a man tracks down his former crime partner to seek retaliation.

title: Hidden Forever
description: After her parents passed away in a horrific car accident, Katja decides to unravel the craziest mystery of her life. Her awry psyche may not be her biggest problem to fix.

title: The 3rd
description: Special Agent Brooks has seen just about everything as one of the FBI's top men. Today he will meet his match as he is called in to stop a crazed bomber with a big secret.

title: Imprint
description: Toby, a world class journalist, finds himself part of the biggest story in human history... if he can only live long enough to get it published.

title: G.H.O.S.T.
description: "G.H.O.S.T" tells the story of Maya - the young producer of a ghost hunting show - and her efforts to save it by taking her team to a haunted opera house in the Deep South. What will the G.H.O.S.T. team do when they realize that the hunters have become the haunted? This is one paranormal activity that they aren't prepared for.

title: All the Fear of the Fair
description: After a roller-coaster accident kills a large party of school children the fair closes down. The owner vows to make amends by building a non-profit youth club filled with all the memorabilia he's had to remove from the now deserted fairground. An unscrupulous property developer Mark Shepherd, promises to finish the club for the old man as old age and illness has halted progress on the club. But once it's signed over to Shepherd he goes back on his word and proposes to change it into a lap-dancing club. All is going well, until a council planning officer arrives to inspect the building work and claims to be able to see the ghosts of the dead kids. The petrified developer refuses to believe her until one of the builders finds all the fairground paraphernalia behind a false wall, including a laughing clown. Then all hell breaks lose.

title: Last Days: Ante Diem, Pt 1
description: Albert has gotten deep into something he doesn't understand. A beautiful woman, and odd and highly paid job on the other side of the world and cheating death. It's a strange and dangerous situation.

title: The Man with the Red Right Hand
description: One man is a struggling writer with little life experience, the other is a cold-blooded hired hitman with a job to complete. Tonight, their paths will cross and they will learn just how funny life and death can be.

title: La dernière scène
description: Jimmy Letourneau, director, filmmaker, finds himself in an interrogation room. Obviously without knowing what he's doing there. It has only one obsession: His film. This is what will soon discover, to their cost, the two officers involved in interviewing Jimmy. Tom Harrison, inspector very devoted to his profession, and Larochelle Kathy, her ambitious intern. Who is this man really? A simple on, thinks it's a genius of the seventh art, or a real danger to his fellows. Tom and Kathy will enter the imagination of Jimmy to find out. Film, three chapters, three murders, a masterpiece. Three murders, the perfect excuse to cause any good police officer. Forced to listen to his story, they will learn gradually really hidden behind this mysterious young man. The beauty of reality, such is his motto. The public is willing to live this turn. His film will be the summary macabre, which led him in this room. Filming his last scene, the alibi for his actions.

title: Days: The Crossmovie
description: A post-apocalyptic tale about the sudden collapse of digital society that puts the fate of its protagonists entirely into the hands of the viewers. One of the first interactive media efforts led by visionary indie artist Flavio Parenti.

title: Darkness Brings
description: Noises in the night and shadows that hide, is what Darkness Brings

title: Hidden in Vicinity
description: Sometimes to save a life, you must commit murder...

title: Daddy, Mommy's Home!
description: A papa is desolate about the death of his wife so that he forgets about the care of his relatives.

title: Circus Envy Presents: Blind Date with a Southern Baptist
description: Envy, Phaedra, and Malaria help Luby-Jean get a date as only they can.

title: Other
description: Obsessed with finding a cure for his terminal illness, a moribund doctor pushes the boundaries of modern science to buy himself some time. However, is a man's fervent will to live enough to grasp the unfathomable limits of knowledge?

title: The Combination
description: Everyone has a secret, even the innocent. When a combination to a safe is all that can keep you out of jail, you'll do just about anything to get it.

title: Natalie's Lose Lose
description: A woman finds herself bound to a chair and gagged. Her tormentor is in a gas mask. There's a voice on the intercom. Who are these people and why did they choose her?

title: The O-Team
description: An elite task force of students set out to retrieve their stolen phones from the clutches of the school administration.

title: Vegas Club Pierce Brosnan James Bond Style Television Commercial
Demented Half
description: A young girl is tormented by her subconscious as she faces daily activities. What seems a sunny spring day turns out to be murderous.

title: Humans vs. Zombies
description: A man tries to evade a horde of zombies using only his parkour skills.

title: Mithivedi
description: A Tamil woman finds herself trapped with the Army in the middle of a minefield with her young child. The Government forces are convinced she works for the rebels. Can she convince them otherwise and make it out of the minefield alive?

title: Days of Suffering: Horror Fairytale
description: Arianna just moved to Milan from a small seaside town, for University. In the new city she finds two new great friends, Chiara and Elisa, and a new love. She doesn't like to think about her past and she concentrates on her new life, talking to her webcam as a diary, sharing a flat with another girl, Beatrice. Suddenly this new equilibrium gets broken by unexpected events. Somebody is looking for her. Even if she doesn't like to turn back, she'll have to face her past. She won't be able to avoid living an unexpected and dark fairytale, where she's the main character.

title: Anodyne
description: A girl with a dark past and a drug addiction decides to see professional from a hypnotherapist in order to overcome her situation. Meanwhile, her boyfriend starts investigating a series of deaths.

title: More Than I Deserve
description: When pushed too far, a student seeks revenge on a bully who deserves it - only to find out that his plan doesn't work out.

title: The Invisible Enemy: Black Fox AudioBook
description: Experience the Audio Drama of the Next Generation: Over 2000+ professional grade sound effects throughout the bestselling novel and an original soundtrack with over 30 theater scores and music tracks.

title: Farworld
description: Along with his android partner, an aging homicide detective in the year 2047 must overcome his hatred of the Grey aliens that now live among us to unravel a conspiracy involving an alien mob boss, a prostitute, an illegal immigrant, and a shady U.S. Senator. As the chaos and intrigue grow, Sam is pulled deeper into the underground of New Mars, TX and it's decline into crime and lawlessness..

10 friends set together a 10-day vacation plan at an isolated location. But, the location, an old burned down asylum now being reconstructed, lures the friends back into the hospital as they try to find their way back to reality or - die trying.

title: Heli Sur (Redline)
description: Two military personnel return to Iraq after the 2003 Iraq war under the auspices of archaeologists to recover a stolen Medes artifact hidden deep in uncharted mountainous territory of Kurdistan. They form a team with locals and trek to the artifact's location, but as they close in on the area they find their emotions and traits become amplified through a mysterious supernatural entity that manipulates and dissipates the team.

title: The End of the Rope
description: This is a remake of the famous movie ''Rope'' By Hitchcock.

title: Hum
description: It's another endless, sleepless night. You're caught in a cycle and weighed down, until something heavy and strange approaches.

title: My Reflected Death
description: Wendell severs his connections with society in attempts to force his hand to end his own life. But things never tend to go as planned for our hero.

title: Run
description: In order to surprise his girlfriend Xiaoyu on her birthday, Ma Nan invites his friends to throw a birthday party at his new home. His best friend, Zhang Bo, who is also Xiao Yu's colleague at the TV station, is responsible for filming the whole thing. Ma Nan, who is deeply in love with Fish, plans to propose to her at the party, but the party is interrupted by the noise of other tenants' quarrels, and the whole building is suddenly plunged into an inexplicable horror, with strange things happening all over the place. They also find that the whole building is sealed off and their mobile phones can't contact the outside world ..

title: Dashamukha
description: Remake of the English classic movie 12 Angry Men in Kannada language

title: Scarfobia
description: Brawn has nightmares of an unlikely villain, a scarf. He believes the scarf is real and after destroying the scarf, she's had enough and takes him to see a shrink. Brawn recounts his dreams to the doctor and after the first session, he meets the scarf for the last time.

title: Death Slot
description: It's a Pachislot Death Game. 10 People Enter, 1 Person Leaves. 10 Million Yen on the line. If you can't handle the flashing lights and the obscenely loud noise of spinning reels and J-Pop music get out of the pachiparlor.

title: Creepy
description: "Creepy" is a homage to the old Creepy comic book. It is for entertainment purposes only.

title: Dawn Rescue
description: Two men relate how they first met in a gay bar 11 years ago, when Dan whispered in Matthew's ear the chilling words which changed his life forever. A blackly comic look at how religion corrupts the innocent.

title: Khane Black
description: A scorned lover and his band of followers seek vengeance against his disloyal fiancée by kidnapping her, abusing her, and plan to murder her and post a series of videos leading up to her death on YouTube for the world to see.

title: There Once Was a Man
description: Derek and Amy awake to find themselves being held in a dark cellar by a mysterious man with a disfigured face.

title: The Short Films of Tellef Johnson
Deathly Kiss
description: For several years sisters Amina and Nadja have been on the run from Smirnov who was promised Amina by her parents. They seek shelter in Stockholm but it seems Smirnov and his vampire clan has found them.

title: Song of Roland
description: The family bonds of gun-smuggling mobsters are shattered when a death propels young Charles O'Shea to the head of power and his reckless nephew reignites a deep-seated feud with a drug lord.

title: Dokurogeki 2: atoaji no warui sasupensu
description: Misuzu Murai had a hobby of divination in college, Yokoyama often lets Misuzu do divination, one day, Yokoyama's grandson got sick and needed surgery, Yokoyama hopes to do something for grandson and let Misuzu do divination, something terrible happened to divination this time.

title: Dark Steel
description: As long as Mitchell controls the dark steel, he has the powers of a God. But will his sadistic lusts get the better of him?

title: The Meaning of Life
description: Wendell leaves the comfort of home life to take his greatest journey into mother nature to find true value, meaning, and importance in life.

title: Epidemic: Prologue
description: A rigid investigator tracks a killer that will eventually lead the case to a tight-knit family and test the family's faith.

title: Macho Mustanaa
description: The film commences by showing a happy and united family, consisting of Nabab, his father, grandfather, elder brother and sister-in-law (who was pregnant). One day, Nabab met Diya on the street and they fell in love with each other. Following this, they had a tough time as Diya's father, Bidhan Chattoraj, hired goons to separate them. Even after spending a lot of time escaping those goons, the goons finally catch them and Bidhan Chottoraj gets his daughter back. Since that incident, Nabab's life faces a turn as he is accused of false charges and sent to the jail. But Bidhan Chattoraj doesn't stop here. In the fire of vengeance, he decides to demolish Nabab's family. He kills Nabab's elder brother and grandfather, paralysis his father, and finally, his sister-in-law lost her unborn child. Nabab becomes furious upon this. The events that occur next, i.e., through which Nabab gets back Diya and takes revenge on Bidhan Chattoraj, form the climax of the story.

title: Those Who Go to Hell
description: Daniel Vicente (Shawn Bernal) is Chicago's most feared hit man whose life has been disciplined by an assassin's creed of solitude and tradition. Serving as the right hand man of Patrick Keller (Chad Sheveland), the second most powerful crime lord in Chicago, Daniel has assisted Patrick into the power and status that he holds. However, when an unexpected double cross occurs during the assassination of a well-known council leader, Daniel finds himself the prime target of the fearsome Madame Lo (Allison Carvalho), leader of the triads. After finding out that Patrick approved the hit on him, Daniel is left stunned and angered. Confused, betrayed, and left with no explanation, Daniel must confront old friends and past demons, while questioning his own creed to find out who he can trust, why he was double crossed, and to ultimately find the reason of his existence.

title: Johnny, Pam, Ronny & Sam
description: The Parker's and Anderson's warped and macabre lifestyle is about to take a twist when new neighbor, Dill Harris, moves in next door and discovers their grizzly secrets.

title: Geometry
description: A man addresses a mysterious friend called Angle-it either spills or it holds.

title: Day of a Thousand Screams
description: TV reporter Natasha McGrath is sent to a remote area. Along with her small crew and a couple of campers, they encounter a man who watches, taunts and kills them one by one: repeatedly.
